# Format Function

## Brief Description
The format function is an R function used to modify the format of a variable that is being printed or displayed. 

## What Package Contains it
The format() function in R is part of the base package and does not require any additional library to load. 

## When to Use it
The format() function is useful for changing the display of variables with long value names, such as country codes or user ids. It can also be used to make long numbers easier to read.
